mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (name, role_id, passwor, email, phone) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{passwor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, passwor = #{passwor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, role_id, passwor, email, phone from user
